channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #KanganaRanaut struck a concil
item.description: #KanganaRanaut struck a conciliatory tone after #BJP reprimanded her over her controversial remarks on the farmers' protest

item.title: #Crickit | Amid the rising spe
item.description: #Crickit | Amid the rising speculations, #SanjivGoenka addressed the possibility of retaining #KLRahul, but kept the suspense alive (via CrickIt)

item.title: #VijayVarma has been dating #T
item.description: #VijayVarma has been dating #TamannaahBhatia for over a year now, and he never intended to keep his love affair a secret
